text: Guilherme Miguel Torriani (born 6 February 1999) is a Brazilian handball player for HC Taubaté and the Brazilian national team. He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==Individual awards and achievements== *2015 Pan American Men's Youth Handball Championship: Top Scorer *2017 Pan American Men's Youth Handball Championship: Top Scorer and All Star Team Left Wing *2019 South and Central American Men's Junior Handball Championship: Top Scorer ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male handball players
title: Guilherme Torriani
